# Troubleshooting Consult the table below should you encounter problems using your camera. If you donâ€™t find the solution here, contact your local Fujifilm distributor. ## Power and Battery | Problem | Solution | |------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **The camera does not turn on.** | - **The battery was not charged before first use:** The battery is not charged at shipment. Charge the battery before first use (ðŸ“– 50).
- **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 50).
- **The battery is inserted incorrectly:** Reinsert in the correct orientation (ðŸ“– 43).
- **The battery-chamber cover is not latched:** Latch the battery-chamber cover (ðŸ“– 43). | | **The monitor does not turn on.** | The monitor may not turn on if the camera is turned off and then on again very quickly. Keep the shutter button pressed halfway until the monitor activates. | | **The battery runs down quickly.** | - **The battery is cold:** Warm the battery by placing it in a pocket or other warm place and reinsert it in the camera immediately before taking a picture.
- **There is dirt on the battery terminals:** Clean the terminals with a soft, dry cloth.
- **ON is selected for AF/MF SETTING > PRE-AF:** Turn PRE-AF off (ðŸ“– 152).
- **The battery has been charged many times:** Select BATTERY AGE to view the battery age; if the battery is old, replace it with a new battery (ðŸ“– 336). |
